      • joinPathComponents

        public static java.lang.String joinPathComponents(java.lang.String prefixPath,
                                  java.lang.String fileNameOrDirectory)
        Abstract method to join string paths. Automatically handles directory separation. The argument paths are assumed to be valid.
        Parameters:
        prefixPath -
        fileNameOrDirectory - Must not be an absolute path.
        Returns:
        Path that is a concatenation of the arguments.
